data.title: Rova discography
data.text:
This is a discography of albums by the Rova saxophone quartet. Rova was formed in 1977 by Jon Raskin, Larry Ochs, Andrew Voigt and Bruce Ackley. Voight left the group in 1988 and was replaced by Steve Adams.

The discography is an attempt to list all albums that include the four members of the quartet playing together. That is: albums by the quartet; by expanded versions of the quartet such as the Special Septet and Rova Orkestrova; by collaborations between the quartet and other musicians; and albums by other musicians that feature the members of the quartet on one of more track.

As Was, Rova Saxophone Quartet, 1981, Metalanguage

Tracks : Quill (For Valda Setterfield), Escape From Zero Village (For Ted Greenwald), Under The Street Where You Live (For Albert Ayler), Paint Another Take Of Shootpop (For Olivier Messiaen And Otis Redding), Daredevils (For Mr. Kite)

Musicians : Jon Raskin, Larry Ochs, Andrew Voigt, Bruce Ackley

Reissued on CD by Atavistic in 2000.

Fred Frith: Freedom In Fragments, Rova Saxophone Quartet, 2001, Tzadik 7076

Tracks : Freedom Is Your Friends / Some Assembly Required, Advertising, Song And Dance, Void Where Prohibited / The Up And Up, Boyan's Problem, Ikue's Song, T Square Park Lark - For Frank Zappa, Significant Restrictions Apply, Hey Ren√©, Chained To The Skyway, Batteries Not Included / Nostalgia, Water Under The Bridge - For Jimmy Giuffre, Freedom Is Your Friends II

Musicians : Jon Raskin, Bruce Ackley, Larry Ochs, Steve Adams

Composed by Fred Frith in 1994. Performed by Rova between February 1999 and January 2000.

The Mirror World (For Stan Brakhage), Larry Ochs / Rova Special Sextet / Orkestrova, 2007, Metalanguage MLX 2007

Tracks : Realization 1: Hand: The Marks / Palm / Fable / That Hunts / Full House / 14 Fingers / Itself Now Corresponding To Sand, Realization 2: Wall: Hit / Hung / Radar / Sonor / Pulsar / Screen / Reflector / Ruin / Omens / Wall

Musicians : Realization 1: Larry Ochs, Darren Johnston, David Bithell, Toyoji Tomita, Jen Baker, Bruce Ackley, Steve Adams, Jon Raskin, Ben Goldberg, John Schott, Joan Jeanrenaud, Theresa Wong, Lisle Ellis, Tim Perkis, Matt Wright, William Winant, Gino Robair, Moe! Staiano / Realization 2: Bruce Ackley, Steve Adams, Larry Ochs, Jon Raskin, Gino Robair, William Winant

A limited edition double CD of two realizations of the Larry Ochs composition The Mirror World (for Stan Brakhage). The pieces were recorded live at Kanbar Hall, Jewish Community Center of San Francisco on June 10 & 11, 2005.
